titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Finding aid prepared by Brian Carpenter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:14-0400

did.unittitle: Songs and Dances of Great Lakes Indians
did.abstract: A compilation LP record of Native American musical and dance recordings made by Gertrude Prokosch Kurath at numerous locations from 1952 to 1954, published in 1956. Also includes a 20-page booklet with extensive background information, biographical info on the performers, explanations of songs, musical analysis, and sheet music.
did.physdesc: 1 sound disc (45 min.) : analog, 33 1/3 rpm, mono ; 12 in.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The record is divided into four sections: Algonquians, Iroquois Animal and War Dances, Food Spirit Dances, and Future Prospects. The Algonquians section is divided into sections according to the location of the recording: Meskwaki of Tama, Iowa; Ojibwa of Lac du Flambeau, Wisconsin; Ojibwa of Baraga, Michigan; Ottawa of L'Arbre Croche, Michigan; Ottawa of Mikado, Michigan; Ojibwa of Isabella Reservation, Michigan. The remaining recordings feature Onondaga, Cayuga, and Seneca performers.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The original recordings for some of the material compiled on this record are available in the recording collections Songs and Dances of the Rural Ottawa and Chippewa Indians (Mss.Rec.20) and Songs from Lac du Flambeau Reservation, Wisconsin (Mss.Rec.75).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: From an LP titled "Songs and Dance of Great Lakes Indians," Ethnic Folkways Library, 1956. In section titled "Algonquians." Liner notes contain extensive notes on songs and performers, and musical analysis.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Phonograph record) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.
